summary: This document is a brief email or internal communication from July 28, 2019, regarding the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein's psychological observation and suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). It notes he is being taken off psych observation and is pending placement in the SHU.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the communication, identified by his inmate number #76318-054, who is being taken off psychological observation and is pending placement in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal update states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of psychological observation and is pending placement in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) (inferred from context of SHU placement)
keyFacts: The document is dated July 28, 2019, just over two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It records that Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was being taken off psychological observation.
It states Epstein was pending placement in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the time.
The communication is a brief administrative update regarding his custody status.
